title: Flight Simulator 2020 - how to - improving your landing skills
description:
In this video I will show you how you can use the world map to plan a flight which is mainly focuses on the final approach/landing piece of a flight. This is based on a question I received based on one of my other videos and thought let's record a small video about it.
